Russia and China are considering putting a nuclear power unit on the Moon -RIARussia and China are considering putting a nuclear power unit on the Moon around 2033-35, Yuri Borisov, the head of Russia's space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday, the RIA state news agency reported. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:28:07 GMT XYQAQ2OEXJKMBDDOC52UTALXFI https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/Russia-china-are-considering-putting-nuclear-power-unit-moon-ria-2024-03-05/Reuters技术空间
Singapore's Temasek in talks to invest in OpenAI, FT reportsSingapore's Temasek Holdings is in discussions to invest in Microsoft-backed artificial intelligence company OpenAI, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing two people familiar with the matter. French 'Spiderman' scales tower to support Philippines' South China Sea claimsA free climber known as the "French Spiderman" scaled a Manila skyscraper on Tuesday to support the Philippines' maritime claims in the disputed South China Sea. Portuguese builder Mota-Engil more than doubles 2023 profitMota-Engil more than doubled its 2023 net profit on record high sales, Portugal's largest builder said on Tuesday, while demand boosted its order book to an unprecedented 13 billion euros ($14.1 billion). Tue, 05 Mar 2024 09:36:59 GMT PVY7D2GQSVJ45LD6XC5QQDYKKQ https://www.reuters.com/business/portuguese-builder-mota-engil-more-than-doubles-2023-profit-2024-03-05/Reuters商业
Exclusive: Country Garden lenders' group hires advisers for debt revamp talksA group of lenders to China's Country Garden has hired Allen & Overy and Deloitte as advisers, three sources with knowledge of the matter said, as creditors to the embattled developer gear up for possible debt restructuring talks. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 09:24:43 GMT XC6P2IFNBNJLBOT37PO4JDN5KI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/country-garden-lenders-group-hires-advisers-debt-revamp-talks-sources-say-2024-03-05/Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim世界中国
